short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trade fungible and non-fungible tokens for HBAR on the Hedera network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Token Trader is a Chrome extension that allows users to exchange NFTs or fungible tokens in return for HBAR securely and effortlessly on the Hedera network.

The app uses Schedule Transactions on the Hedera Token Service (HTS) to facilitate transactions. Private keys are encrypted with 256-bit AES encryption and PBKDF2 key derivation. Keys never leave the user's device and may be deleted at any point.

The fees are:
- 1% fee for trades below 1000 HBAR
- 10 HBAR fixed fee for trades above 1000 HBAR
